abstract.t: This document describes syslog-auth, an attempt to add origin authentication, message integrity, replay-resistance, message sequencing, and missing message detection to syslog, while continuing to allow the use of UDP for syslog messages. Syslog-auth supports many different setups for syslog devices, relays, and collectors. Syslog-auth should be implemented on all devices, relays, and collectors being used together
